items.name: static var cacheProperty: AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags
items.desc: A property listener sets this flag to instruct the parser to cache the property value so that it remains available after the callback returns.

items.name: static var propertyIsCached: AudioFileStreamPropertyFlags
items.desc: This flag is set when the callback AudioFileStream_PropertyListenerProc is invoked in the case that the value of the property has been cached and can be obtained later.
